product_overview: Pizza Express is a responsive web-based pizza delivery application that enables customers to browse a categorized menu, customize orders with size and quantity selections, add items to a persistent shopping cart, place orders with validated customer and payment details, and track their orders in real-time with status updates and delivery information.
core_goals: Provide an intuitive and visually appealing homepage with quick access to featured products and location finder.
Enable users to browse a comprehensive pizza menu with filtering and size options.
Allow customers to easily add, modify, and remove items in a shopping cart with price calculations and promo code support.
Facilitate a smooth, validated checkout process capturing delivery and payment information.
Offer real-time order tracking with clear progress steps and delivery details.
Maintain mobile-first responsive design for seamless use across devices.
Ensure data persistence across sessions using local storage.
key_features: Homepage landing page featuring hero section, featured pizzas, company info, and a location finder modal.
Full menu system with categories: Pizzas, Appetizers, Drinks, and Desserts; includes filtering and size selection for pizzas.
Shopping cart management with add, update, remove functionalities and summary of order costs including promo code discounts.
Detailed cart page with delivery and pickup options, promo code application, and a checkout modal with forms.
Checkout process comprising customer info, delivery address, payment details, and order confirmation.
Real-time order tracking system with order lookup, progress visualization, and delivery driver info.
Responsive navigation bar with cart item counter and mobile-friendly collapsible menu.
Local storage management for cart data persistence and cross-page data sharing.
Form validation for customer details, payment info, and order tracking inputs.
Mobile-first responsive design using Bootstrap grid and Tailwind CSS utilities.
Interactive modal components including location finder, checkout, and order success confirmations.
Promo code validation and discount application system.
user_flow_summary: User lands on homepage, views featured pizzas, and accesses the location finder modal.
User navigates to the menu, filters items by category, selects pizza sizes, and adds items to the cart.
User reviews the cart, modifies quantities or removes items, applies promo codes, and chooses delivery or pickup.
User proceeds to checkout, fills validated forms for customer, delivery, and payment details, and places the order.
User receives order confirmation modal and can lookup and track order status using order number and phone.
User views real-time order progress with clear steps from order confirmation through delivery, including driver details when applicable.
User can navigate across all pages using a responsive navigation bar with clear active states and cart status.
validation_criteria: Users must be able to add items of various sizes and categories to the cart and see accurate price calculations including taxes and discounts.
Cart data should persist across page reload and be correctly shared across pages.
Forms for customer info, payment details, and order lookup must validate input and prevent invalid submissions.
Promo codes entered must be validated and appropriately apply discounts.
Order tracking must display correct status progression and relevant delivery information when available.
Navigation and interactive UI components must be fully responsive and functional on mobile and desktop devices.
Checkout process must complete successfully with confirmation shown to the user.
Location finder and other modals must open and close correctly and support interaction.
All key user flows (browsing menu, ordering, applying promo codes, tracking orders) must function seamlessly without errors.
